message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take the 30 before it shrinks even more!
I think we can both do better than that. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share.  I'll be fair, though, and give you the option to take the lead next round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is shrinking, but so is yours! Take the 35 before it shrinks even further.
